content: Luna was a bit anxious at the vet's office, but she's always like that. The vet said she's perfectly healthy, though, so that's a relief! And, yeah, the new food bowl was just a stainless steel one I got from Petco. I got it on sale, and it was a good deal, so I figured why not? It's been a week now, and Luna seems to really like it. I got it on... let me think... Wednesday, I believe.
